mapper.select: select g.GOOD_ID, g.GOOD_NAME, g.GOOD_SIZE, g.GOOD_VALUE, g.CATEGORY_ID, g.WARNING_VALUE, c.CATEGORY_NAME from wms_goods g LEFT JOIN wms_category c ON g.CATEGORY_ID = c.CATEGORY_ID

select g.GOOD_ID, g.GOOD_NAME, g.GOOD_SIZE, g.GOOD_VALUE, g.CATEGORY_ID, g.WARNING_VALUE, c.CATEGORY_NAME from wms_goods g LEFT JOIN wms_category c ON g.CATEGORY_ID = c.CATEGORY_ID where g.GOOD_ID = #{id}

select g.GOOD_ID, g.GOOD_NAME, g.GOOD_SIZE, g.GOOD_VALUE, g.CATEGORY_ID, g.WARNING_VALUE, c.CATEGORY_NAME from wms_goods g LEFT JOIN wms_category c ON g.CATEGORY_ID = c.CATEGORY_ID where g.GOOD_ID IN
#{id}

select g.GOOD_ID, g.GOOD_NAME, g.GOOD_SIZE, g.GOOD_VALUE, g.CATEGORY_ID, g.WARNING_VALUE, c.CATEGORY_NAME from wms_goods g LEFT JOIN wms_category c ON g.CATEGORY_ID = c.CATEGORY_ID where g.GOOD_NAME = #{goodsName}

select g.GOOD_ID, g.GOOD_NAME, g.GOOD_SIZE, g.GOOD_VALUE, g.CATEGORY_ID, g.WARNING_VALUE, c.CATEGORY_NAME from wms_goods g LEFT JOIN wms_category c ON g.CATEGORY_ID = c.CATEGORY_ID where g.GOOD_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{goodsName}),'%')
mapper.update: update wms_goods set GOOD_NAME = #{name}, GOOD_SIZE = #{size}, GOOD_VALUE = #{value}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}, WARNING_VALUE = #{warningValue} where GOOD_ID = #{id}
